files.patch:
@@ -89,0 +89,9 @@
+# Test and fix LoongArch64.
+if [ "x$OUT" = x ]; then
+  if [ `uname -s` = Linux ]; then
+    if [ `uname -m` = loongarch64 ]; then
+      OUT=loongarch64-unknown-linux-gnu
+    fi
+  fi
+fi
+

@@ -1020,0 +1020,1 @@
+runstatedir
@@ -1265,0 +1266,1 @@
+runstatedir='${localstatedir}/run'
@@ -1517,0 +1519,9 @@
+  -runstatedir | --runstatedir | --runstatedi | --runstated \
+  | --runstate | --runstat | --runsta | --runst | --runs \
+  | --run | --ru | --r)
+    ac_prev=runstatedir ;;
+  -runstatedir=* | --runstatedir=* | --runstatedi=* | --runstated=* \
+  | --runstate=* | --runstat=* | --runsta=* | --runst=* | --runs=* \
+  | --run=* | --ru=* | --r=*)
+    runstatedir=$ac_optarg ;;
+
@@ -1654,1 +1665,1 @@
-		libdir localedir mandir
+		libdir localedir mandir runstatedir
@@ -1807,0 +1818,1 @@
+  --runstatedir=DIR       modifiable per-process data [LOCALSTATEDIR/run]
@@ -4431,1 +4443,1 @@
-DATE_WHEN_GENERATED=1694011184
+DATE_WHEN_GENERATED=1704508692
@@ -13921,0 +13933,6 @@
+    loongarch64)
+      VAR_CPU=loongarch64
+      VAR_CPU_ARCH=loongarch
+      VAR_CPU_BITS=64
+      VAR_CPU_ENDIAN=little
+      ;;
@@ -14059,0 +14077,6 @@
+    loongarch64)
+      VAR_CPU=loongarch64
+      VAR_CPU_ARCH=loongarch
+      VAR_CPU_BITS=64
+      VAR_CPU_ENDIAN=little
+      ;;

@@ -1952,0 +1952,3 @@
+  #ifndef EM_LOONGARCH
+  #define EM_LOONGARCH  258               /* LoongArch */
+  #endif
@@ -1975,0 +1978,1 @@
+    {EM_LOONGARCH,   EM_LOONGARCH, ELFCLASS64, ELFDATA2LSB, (char*)"LoongArch"},
@@ -2007,0 +2011,2 @@
+  #elif  (defined LOONGARCH)
+    static  Elf32_Half running_arch_code=EM_LOONGARCH;
@@ -2009,1 +2015,1 @@
-         IA32, AMD64, IA64, __sparc, __powerpc__, ARM, S390, ALPHA, MIPS, MIPSEL, PARISC, M68K, AARCH64
+         IA32, AMD64, IA64, __sparc, __powerpc__, ARM, S390, ALPHA, MIPS, MIPSEL, PARISC, M68K, AARCH64, LOONGARCH
